document.full_text: a pennsylvania medical center demoted a surgeon and suspended a nurse who were involved in the transplant of a kidney from a donor who had hepatitis c, a spokeswoman said on thursday.
document.title: pittsburgh medical center demotes surgeon after transplant
lines_and_colors: a pennsylvania medical center demoted a surgeon and suspended a nurse who were involved in the transplant of a kidney from a donor who had hepatitis c, a spokeswoman said on thursday.
